DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect ALKS 5461 QT interval healthy volunteer well evaluate safety tolerability ALKS 5461 .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Effect ALKS 5461 QT Intervals Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18.030.0 kg/m2 screening Is physically healthy Agree abide contraception requirement duration study Additional criterion may apply Have positive pregnancy test and/or currently breastfeed Have history current infection Hepatitis B virus , Hepatitis C virus , human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) Have current evidence history clinically significant medical psychiatric condition observe abnormality Have skin condition likely interfere ECG electrode placement adhesion Have current abuse dependence ( within past 5 year ) drug ( exclusive nicotine caffeine ) Have use prescription overthecounter ( OTC ) medication , include natural health product dietary supplement ( exception prescription contraceptives hormonal replacement , acetaminophen , ibuprofen , multivitamin ) , consume grapefruit grapefruit product within 14 day prior first study drug dose Have consume alcohol , caffeine , xanthinecontaining product within 24 hour prior first study drug dose Have use nicotine within 90 day prior first study drug dose Have use opioids 30 day prior screen , anticipated need opioid medication study Additional criterion may apply
